A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not good. Visually wonderful and DRIVER gives a great performance but other than that? The movie doesn't really work. And the casino subplot is pointless I get what their trying to articulate but it made the movie 40 minutes longer for NO reason. Poe's plot is nonsensical as well. This film has good moments but that's all they are; moments. \"SALT?!?\" That was the stupidest moment I've seen in a main stream film in a LONG time
